sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-course-registration', templateUrl: './course-registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./course-registration.component.css'] }) export class CourseRegistrationComponent { courseform= new FormGroup({ CourseName: new FormControl(), InstructorName: new FormControl(), InstructorEmail: new FormControl(), InstructorPhone: new FormControl(), CourseDuration: new FormControl(), CourseDescription: new FormControl(), CoursePreRequisites: new FormControl(), CourseOutcome: new FormControl() }) }

Course Registration
